price: ប្រសិនបើយើងមានចេតនា យើងនឹងធ្វើវាឱ្យក្លាយទៅជា ប្រៃល្វីង។ ដូចេ្នះ ហេតុអ្វីបានជាពួកអ្នកមិនដឹងគុណ?
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ أُجَاجٗا فَلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: law nashāu jaʿalnāhu ujājan falawlā tashkurūna
translations: then why are you not grateful
then why are you not grateful
